summary: Toru recalls his life in the 1960s, when his friend Kizuki killed himself and he grew close to Naoko, Kizuki's girlfriend, and another woman, the outgoing, lively Midori.
cast: Ken'ichi Matsuyama|Rinko Kikuchi|Kiko Mizuhara|Kengo Kôra|Reika Kirishima|Eriko Hatsune|Tokio Emoto|Takao Handa|Yusuke|Yûki Itô|Kentarô Tamura|Makoto Sugisawa|Kohei Yoshino|Sawako Okuma|Haruka Masuda|Yui Higashiyama|Izumi Hirasawa|Mariko Yamanaka|Shinichi Hara|Wataru Ohshige|Tomoako Miyake|Masahiro Kobori|Shigesato Itoi|Haruomi Hosono|Yukihiro Takahashi|Tetsuji Tamayama|Rika Yasui Hammen
director: Director: Anh Hung Tran (as Tran Anh Hung)
title: Tokio Blues
